bibl.title: Agriculture and Taxation in Early Ptolemaic Egypt. Demotic Land Surveys and Accounts (P. Agri)

bibl.seg: Andrew Monson, Agriculture and Taxation in Early Ptolemaic Egypt. Demotic Land Surveys and Accounts (P. Agri) = Papyrologische Texte und Abhandlungen. 46.
Bonn, R. Habelt, 2012, 4°, xii-176 pp., 3 tabl., 9 figg. et 30 pll. ISBN 978-3-7749-3807-6. €65.
P. Agri 1-12 [= P. Cair. Inv. II 30693; 31073; 31253; 50006]. Ta-any?, Arsinoite, ca. 216/215? BCE. - I. Introduction. - II. Historical Analysis. - III. Text Editions. - Bibliography. Indices.
